nodeList: SELECT DISTINCT serverName AS node FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE;
apps: SELECT webappName, webappType, sum(averageRequestCount) as total_requests, sum(httpSuccessCount) as total_http_success, sum(httpErrorCount) as total_http_error FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1} GROUP BY webappName ORDER BY webappName;
pastStat: SELECT webappName, round(avg(averageRequestCount)) as averageRequestCount FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1} AND time  > (STR_TO_DATE('{2}', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') - INTERVAL 1 {3}) GROUP BY webappName;
geo: SELECT {1} as name, sum(averageRequestCount) as request_count, round((sum(averageRequestCount)*100/(select sum(averageRequestCount) FROM {2} {3} )),2) as percentage_request_count FROM {2} {3} GROUP BY {1} ORDER BY percentage_request_count DESC;
technology: SELECT {1} as name, sum(averageRequestCount) as request_count, round((sum(averageRequestCount)*100/(select sum(averageRequestCount) FROM {2} {3} )),2) as percentage_request_count FROM {2} {3} GROUP BY {1} ORDER BY percentage_request_count DESC;
httpStatus: SELECT responseHttpStatusCode as name, sum(averageRequestCount) as request_count, round((sum(averageRequestCount)*100/(select sum(averageRequestCount) FROM HTTP_STATUS {1} )),2) as percentage_request_count FROM HTTP_STATUS {1} GROUP BY responseHttpStatusCode ORDER BY percentage_request_count DESC;
timeVarying: SELECT {1} as value, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(substring(time,1,13), '%Y-%m-%d %H:')) * 1000 as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {2} GROUP BY substring(time,1,13);
traffic: SELECT sum(averageRequestCount) as request_count, round((sum(averageRequestCount) *100/(select sum(averageRequestCount) FROM {1} {3} )),2) as percentage_request_count, {2} as name FROM {1} {3} GROUP BY {2};
infoBoxRequest: SELECT sum(averageRequestCount) as totalRequest, max(averageRequestCount) as maxRequest, avg(averageRequestCount) as avgRequest, min(averageRequestCount) as minRequest FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1};
infoBoxResponse: SELECT max(averageResponseTime) as maxResponse, avg(averageResponseTime) as avgResponse, min(averageResponseTime) as minResponse FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1};
infoBoxSession: SELECT sum(sessionCount) as totalSession, avg(sessionCount) as avgSession FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1};
infoBoxError: SELECT sum(httpErrorCount) as totalError, (sum(httpErrorCount)*100)/(sum(httpSuccessCount)+sum(httpErrorCount)) as percentageError FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {1};
infoBoxGreaterThan1200Days: SELECT {1}({2}) as value, YEAR(time) as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {3} GROUP BY YEAR(time);
infoBoxGreaterThan90Days: SELECT {1}({2}) as value, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%b %Y') as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {3} GROUP BY MONTH(time);
infoBoxGreaterThan30Days: SELECT {1}({2}) as value, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(time, INTERVAL (1 - DAYOFWEEK(time)) DAY),'%b %d %Y'), ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(time, INTERVAL (7 - DAYOFWEEK(time)) DAY),'%b %d %Y')) as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {3} GROUP BY WEEK(time);
infoBoxGreaterThan1Day: SELECT {1}({2}) as value, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%b %d %Y') as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {3} GROUP BY DATE(time);
infoBoxLessThan1Day: SELECT {1}({2}) as value, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%H:00') as time FROM REQUESTS_SUMMARY_PER_MINUTE {3} GROUP BY HOUR(time);
